timeline.bodyText: I'd prefer to move the bulk of this method into UnicodeUnawareCharClassFinder.after (removing the static modifier from UnicodeUnawareCharClassFinder) and keep the tradition of checkRegex being implemented as only new UnicodeUnawareCharClassFinder().visit(regexForLiterals);.
timeline.author: sebastian-hungerecker-sonarsource

timeline.bodyText: I think this getter can be removed. You access the other variables without a getter as well and if you move the code using the variables into after, there's no need for getters anyway.
timeline.author: sebastian-hungerecker-sonarsource
